ygData.subject: Re: Wizard what are we? (Long, hmm very long)
ygData.msgSnippet: No, I don t believe that our mana goes out too fast.  But you know what?? This isn t the forum for this debate.  Not only that, this debate is getting very
ygData.messageBody:
No, I don't believe that our mana goes out too fast. But you know what??
This isn't the forum for this debate. Not only that, this debate is getting
very old, very fast. If you're not happy with the wizard class, email
Verant or do a /feedback. I didn't subscribe to this list to hear ppl bash
the class that I have chosen to play. If this continues, then I will
unhappily be forced to cancel my subsription.

Talarin Kal'Amon, High Elven Wizard


----- Original Message -----
From: Wizard <wizard@...>
To: <_EQ_Magic@onelist.com>
Sent: Wednesday, May 26, 1999 7:04 AM
Subject: Re: [_EQ_Magic] Wizard what are we? (Long, hmm very long)


> From: Wizard <wizard@...>
>
> First this game is not near maturity and all classes get tuned in, wizards
> need less changes that others classes but THEY NEED CORECTIONS ALSO !! All
> classes go tuned in as time pass. I understand that you like a look of
> sheer force but if you think a little about you will see that mana goes
out
> too fast and without mana a wizard is a shell with no use damage start to
> be resisted at lv where other classes are not resisted why? do you know
> what is a exp loss as a wizard?.
>
>
>
> At 21.42 25/05/99 -0400, you wrote:
> >From: JDThorn007@...
> >
> >You are all nuts. Wizards are great as they are. Want to run faster?
Get
> >JM boots? want to have a chance to run, use your skin series spells.
want
> >heals? get squad rings and potions. but nothing anyone else can get can
> >match the sheer devastation we inflict. i am well past the halfway mark
to
> >50, and let me tell you, the smile on my face keeps getting bigger. just
> >make it past the hump, around 20 your deaths become less frequent if you
are
> >smart and do not try soloing often. remember, nothing replaces what
another
> >class can do, ever.
> >
> >Kalleon Valkyrre
> >Karana
> >
